title.en: An Aspiration for the Spread of the Teachings of the Eight Great Chariots of the Practice Lineage

text.en: Namo guru-buddha-bodhisattvāya!
text.en-trans: namo guru buddha bodhisatvaye

text.en: Buddhas and bodhisattvas throughout the whole of space and time, with your noble resolve,
text.en-trans: chok dü gyalwa sé ché tukkyé dang

text.en: And all you adepts and vidyādharas of India and Tibet in your oceanic immensity—
text.en-trans: gya bö rigdzin drubtob gyatso yi

text.en: Let the compassion of your knowledge, love and power burst forth,
text.en-trans: khyen tsé nüpé tukjé tsal chung la

text.en: And make these utterly pure aspirations of mine come true!
text.en-trans: namdak mönpé né di drubpar dzö

text.en: May the tradition of Padmākara, who embodies all Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsa sum kündü pema jungné dang

text.en: The great abbot Śāntarakṣita, sovereign of the teachings,
text.en-trans: tenpé ngadak khenchen zhiwatso

text.en: And the Dharma-king Tsangpa Lhayi Metok,
text.en-trans: chögyal tsangpa lha yi metok gi

text.en: The teachings of kama and terma, spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: ringluk kater tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: May the excellent tradition of pure view and conduct,
text.en-trans: sung rab tamché dampar sharwa yi

text.en: The threefold lineage of the Jowo Kadampa,
text.en-trans: gyüpa sumden jowo kadampé

text.en: In which all scriptures arise as personal instructions,
text.en-trans: tachö nampar dakpé gyün zang di

text.en: Remain without decline until the aeon’s very end!
text.en-trans: kalpé tar yang nubpar magyur chik

text.en: May the precious Sakyapa teachings, perfectly complete,
text.en-trans: tubten do dang ngak kyi chö tsul nam

text.en: Which are unerring and confident in their precise analysis
text.en-trans: manor jizhin jé la nyeng dralwé

text.en: Of the sūtra and mantra systems of Buddhadharma,
text.en-trans: yongdzok tenpé ngadak sakyapé

text.en: Spread throughout the whole world of Jambudvīpa!
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen dzam ling künkhyab shok

text.en: May the supreme teachings of the definitive Mahāmudrā
text.en-trans: palden dorjé chang né lek ongpé

text.en: And oceanic tantras in the lineage of the four transmissions1
text.en-trans: ka zhi gyüpé ngak gyü gyatso dang

text.en: That perfectly derive from the glorious Vajradhara
text.en-trans: ngedön chakgya chenpö tenpa chok

text.en: Never wane but through teaching and practice spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: mi nub shé dang drubpé dargyé shok

text.en: May the ripening empowerments and liberating instructions
text.en-trans: yeshe daki nyi sok pakyul gyi

text.en: Of the Golden Dharma of Khyungpo Naljor with its fivefold ultimate,
text.en-trans: khé dang drubpé tuk chü shangpa jé

text.en: The noble Shangpa, which is the heart essence of the learned and accomplished
text.en-trans: tartuk ngaden khyungpo naljor gyi

text.en: Of the noble land, such as the two wisdom ḍākinīs,2never wane but flourish!
text.en-trans: ser chö mindrol dargyé nubmé shok

text.en: May the teachings of both Jonang and Zhalu traditions,
text.en-trans: gyüdé zhi yi chulung bumtrak khyil

text.en: In which myriad rivers of the four classes of tantra merge,
text.en-trans: dorjé naljor yenlak drukpa yi

text.en: The six branches of Vajra Yoga3
text.en-trans: drubpé gyalsar dzek la da mepa

text.en: That lead matchlessly to the royal seat of accomplishment, thrive!
text.en-trans: jo zhal nam nyi tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: May the instructions for pacifying suffering which derive
text.en-trans: ali kali chulung chenpo yi

text.en: From the tantraGreat River of Vowels and Consonants (Āli Kāli),
text.en-trans: gyü kyi dampa dukngal zhijé dang

text.en: And the practice of Severance, which is the profound import of the Mother Prajñāpāramitā,
text.en-trans: yum dön zabmo machik lab drön gyi

text.en: And heart treasure of Machik Labdrön, spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: tuk dzö chö yul nyamlen dargyé shok

text.en: May the unsurpassed practice of the perfection phase,
text.en-trans: wen sum ten né go sum dorjé sum

text.en: The heart-essence of the great adept Orgyenpa,
text.en-trans: nyendrub drubtob chenpo orgyen pé

text.en: The approach and accomplishment of the three vajras for the three doors
text.en-trans: tuk kyi tiklé lamé dzokrim gyi

text.en: Based on threefold isolation, fade no further but expand and spread again!
text.en-trans: nyamlen nubmé lar yang pelgyé shok

text.en: In addition, may the other excellent streams of teaching that exist,
text.en-trans: zhenyang tsembu pa dang mitra sok

text.en: Among all the gurus of various lineages of minor instruction,
text.en-trans: tri tren gyüpé lama tamché kyi

text.en: Such as those from Kantalipa and Mitrayogin, all endure,
text.en-trans: damngak gyün zang jinyé yöpa nam

text.en: Upheld forever more by study, contemplation and meditation.
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé yündu nepar shok

text.en: May those who gather to study and practice the dharma treasuries
text.en-trans: gangjong shedrub lam sol malüpé

text.en: Of the Jamgön gurus, the bodhisattvas of the three families,
text.en-trans: kabab sang chen chö kyi duwa po

text.en: Compilers of the great secret dharma of special transmissions
text.en-trans: jamgön lama rik sum sempa yi

text.en: From all traditions of study and practice in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: chö dzö shé dang drubpé dü tsok kyi

text.en: Increase and fill each and every corner of this world;
text.en-trans: dzinmé khyön kün tamché khyabpa dang

text.en: May all the troubles of this dark age be pacified;
text.en-trans: nakchok dü kyi güpa kün zhi né

text.en: May the teachings and their holders be exalted unto the very peak of existence,
text.en-trans: ten dang tendzin upang sitser to

text.en: And may the eight great chariots of the practice lineage spread far and wide.
text.en-trans: drubgyü shingta ché gyé gyé gyur chik
